trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"></xref> event or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 메서드를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"> </xref> 이벤트 또는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>이벤트에 의해 발생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A>메서드를 고는 연결 작업이 시작 신호를 보냅니다 (예를 들어 사용자가 컨트롤을 선택 하 고 연결 동사를 클릭), 아직 완료 되지.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 완료 되기 전에 연결을 취소할 수를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event.
trans-unit.target: 연결이 성공적으로 완료 되 면이 이벤트가 다음는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method has otherwise been called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>이벤트에 의해 발생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A>메서드를 알립니다 사용자가 연결 끊기 동사를 클릭 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>메서드를 호출 했음을.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnecting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 완료 되기 전에 연결을 종료 하는 과정을 취소할 수를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event.
trans-unit.target: 연결이 성공적으로 종료 되 면이 이벤트가 다음는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler 대리자에 지정 된 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add custom handlers for the events by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` and `OnWebPartsConnecting` attributes to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning custom method names to the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 개발자가 추가 하 여 이벤트에 대 한 사용자 지정 처리기를 추가할 수는 `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` 및 `OnWebPartsConnecting` 특성에 `<asp:webpartmanager>` 요소와 특성에 사용자 지정 메서드 이름을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 처리기를 프로그래밍 방식으로 할당할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 이벤트 처리기를 할당에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [NIB: 방법: 이벤트에 이벤트 처리기 메서드에 연결](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)합니다.
